feed.title: Dozzle Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v7.0.2
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes typo. fixes #2991  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2991 (22975)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v7.0.3
entry.content:
üö® Breaking Changes

  • Adds services and stacks to fuzzy search. Note labels will no longer be searchable due to a bug on sorting.  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2999 (3a30c)

   üöÄ Features

  • Disables user select for dates on simple and complex logs. fixes #2967  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2994 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2967 (c2c70)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Aborts fetchings more request when container is changed. fixes #2993  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2995 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2993 (4829a)
  • Fixes a bug when searching for multiple words in fuzzy popup  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3000 (da62a)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v7.0.4
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Changes the host when a new container is chosen  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3001 (8dce7)
  • Adds severe  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3005 (496a8)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Implements logfmt with more strict rules. fixes #3006  -  by @amir20 and @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3007 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3006 (a0d60)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v7.0.5
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Show start event for containers  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3014 (22021)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes nil pointer when message is null  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3012 (0bab8)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v7.0.6
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Display top 10 in fuzzysearch  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3023 (9447b)
  • Improves search by showing all matches within threshold and enable scrolling instead  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3029 (214b1)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Improves keyboard navigation and styling of fuzzy search  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3031 (f9c29)
  • Adds missing . in swarm id for containter title  -  by @amir20 (4b48b)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3016 (6de5c)
  • Update dependency vite to v5.2.13  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3018 (de091)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3032 (1898b)
    View changes on GitHub
